plot: Patrick, an Iraq war veteran, talks over the possibility or re-enlisting in the military with his grandfather, a World War II veteran. But Patrick ends up learning about a painful war memory.
title: Wartime
plot_es: Patrick, an Iraq war veteran, talks over the possibility or re-enlisting in the military with his grandfather, a World War II veteran. But Patrick ends up learning about a painful war memory.
